column4: I used this: sudo apt-get install apache2 php5-mysql libapache2-mod-php5 mysql-server to install a LAMP server on my ubuntu gusty pc, but PHP isn't working. (when I visit my php file in localhost, i can actually download the source file...) What's wrong?

I used this: sudo apt-get install apache2 php5-mysql libapache2-mod-php5 mysql-server to install a LAMP server on my ubuntu gusty pc, but PHP isn't working. (when I visit my php file in localhost, i can actually download the source file...) What's wrong?

I used this: sudo apt-get install apache2 php5-mysql libapache2-mod-php5 mysql-server to install a LAMP server on my ubuntu gusty pc, but PHP isn't working. (when I visit my php file in localhost, i can actually download the source file...) What's wrong?
the last time I had the problem I had to clear the cookies on firefox, it was not a server side issue, it was a browser issue
